content.prompt: Which of the following expresses the role that the Guardian Council plays in Iranâ€™s electoral process, according to the passage?

choices.label: The Guardian Council monitors all of the campaign fund-raising that political candidates must do when running for elected office in Iran.
The Guardian Council holds political debates so that the voting public can hear the views of the candidates that are running for political office in Iran.
The Guardian Council recruits candidates from a variety of political parties to ensure that a wide cross section of the population is represented in Iranian government.
The Guardian Council vets all of the candidates seeking political office in Iran to make sure that all candidates have proper qualifications.
